Description: Painted wooden shabti of Mutemwiya with black tripartite wig, red face with black eyes and eyebrows, red basket on back and hoes held by arms on front, red bordered vertical line of black hieroglyphs down front, white fillet.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
